titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vassar College Buildings and Grounds Files, 1879-2007 (bulk 1910-2000)
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Matthew Thorenz

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Matthew Thorenz August 2012

did.head: Collection Summary

origination.label: Creator:
origination.persname: Vassar College. Buildings and Grounds Department

did.unittitle: Vassar College Buildings and Grounds Files

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Materials related to basic service, construction, renovation and maintenance projects to the college’s buildings and property.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: The Buildings and Grounds Department at Vassar College is responsible for the maintenance and improvement of the campus architecture and landscape. Plumbing, electric, carpentry and masonry projects, along with custodial and grounds services, are administered by the Buildings and Grounds Department. Other programs, such as Facilities Systems and Services, Project Management, Energy Management and the Service Response Center also fall under the jurisdiction of Vassar’s Buildings and Grounds Department. In addition to basic services, the department also provides materials and labor for special events, renovation projects and major construction or demolition services that require the assistance of outside contractors and service providers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Reports, specifications, correspondence, plans, photographs, financial information and other material related to basic services, construction and renovation projects to Vassar buildings and properties under the direction of, or in conjunction with Vassar’s Buildings and Grounds Department.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Vassar College Buildings and Grounds Plans

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Folder listing created by Matthew Thorenz and Ekremet Akainyah, 2012.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Vassar College Buildings and Grounds Files, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
